contextId.occurrenceNote: This negative statement is used to stress that the opposite is true. Alternate translation: "they consider themselves to be a special nation" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: do not consider themselves as just an ordinary nation

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in a positive statement. "we know for certain that every man is here" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
